vocabulary.definition: an exciting experience or journey
vocabulary.example: We went on an adventure to explore the forest

vocabulary.definition: to find something for the first time
vocabulary.example: Scientists discover new animals in the ocean

vocabulary.definition: to travel and learn about new places
vocabulary.example: Let's explore the mysterious cave

vocabulary.definition: able to make new and interesting things
vocabulary.example: She drew a creative picture with bright colors

vocabulary.definition: special and different from everything else
vocabulary.example: Every snowflake has a unique pattern

vocabulary.definition: very surprising and wonderful
vocabulary.example: The fireworks made an amazing display in the sky

vocabulary.definition: a trip from one place to another
vocabulary.example: The journey to grandma's house takes two hours

vocabulary.definition: being brave when something is scary
vocabulary.example: It takes courage to speak in front of many people

vocabulary.definition: to do something special for a happy event
vocabulary.example: We celebrate birthdays with cake and presents

vocabulary.definition: a special relationship between people who care about each other
vocabulary.example: Their friendship lasted for many years

vocabulary.definition: to think about something or feel amazed
vocabulary.example: I wonder what's inside that mysterious box

vocabulary.definition: wanting to learn or know about something
vocabulary.example: The curious cat investigated every corner of the room

vocabulary.definition: something very valuable and special
vocabulary.example: The pirates searched for buried treasure

vocabulary.definition: very old, from long ago
vocabulary.example: The ancient castle was built hundreds of years ago

vocabulary.definition: something that is hard to understand or explain
vocabulary.example: The missing cookies were a mystery until we found crumbs

vocabulary.definition: caring deeply about others and wanting to help them
vocabulary.example: She showed compassion by helping the injured bird

vocabulary.definition: extremely beautiful and impressive
vocabulary.example: The magnificent waterfall took our breath away

vocabulary.definition: extremely interesting and captivating
vocabulary.example: The documentary about wolves was fascinating

vocabulary.definition: very unusual and remarkable
vocabulary.example: Her extraordinary talent amazed everyone

vocabulary.definition: difficult to understand or explain
vocabulary.example: The mysterious footprints led into the dark forest

vocabulary.definition: the ability to create pictures and ideas in your mind
vocabulary.example: Her imagination helped her write wonderful stories

vocabulary.definition: decided to do something and not giving up
vocabulary.example: The determined athlete practiced every day

vocabulary.definition: to understand the value of something good
vocabulary.example: We should appreciate the beautiful sunset

vocabulary.definition: to know what something means
vocabulary.example: I understand how to solve this math problem

vocabulary.definition: amazing and hard to believe
vocabulary.example: The acrobat did an incredible flip in the air

vocabulary.definition: having a job or duty to take care of something
vocabulary.example: Taking care of a pet is a big responsibility

vocabulary.definition: willing to give and share with others
vocabulary.example: The generous neighbor shared vegetables from her garden

vocabulary.definition: to complete or finish something successfully
vocabulary.example: She was proud to accomplish her goal of reading 50 books

vocabulary.definition: the natural world around us
vocabulary.example: We should protect our environment by recycling

vocabulary.definition: to give or add something to help
vocabulary.example: Everyone can contribute to making the school better

vocabulary.definition: lasting forever and not changing
vocabulary.example: The permanent marker won't wash off easily

vocabulary.definition: to share ideas and feelings with others
vocabulary.example: Animals communicate in many different ways

vocabulary.definition: working together to achieve something
vocabulary.example: The project required cooperation from the whole team

vocabulary.definition: a chance to do something good
vocabulary.example: Learning to play piano is a wonderful opportunity

vocabulary.definition: able to do things by yourself
vocabulary.example: She became more independent when she learned to ride a bike
